channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Aura’s latest, gift-worthy digital photo frame is $30 off for Black Friday
item.description: Since its release earlier this year, we’ve constantly found ourselves wanting to add the Aura Aspen to just about every gift guide we’ve put together (and for good reason). If you’re looking to gift a gadget that actually feels personal, Aura’s go-to digital picture frame is a great choice. And right now, the 12-inch frame […]

item.title: One lens or two? Either way this AU Black Friday deal gets you a Canon mirrorless camera for under a grand
item.description: Even without a discount, the Canon EOS R100 single-lens kit costs under a grand in Australia, but you can take advantage of the current 27% discount and pick up this truly an exceptional entry-level mirrorless camera for even less.

item.title: I've been a PC gamer for my entire life - these are the Black Friday deals I'd buy to upgrade my setup
item.description: I have 20 years of PC gaming under my belt, and these are the Black Friday deals that caught my eye.

item.title: You can pick up 32GB of DDR5 RAM with a whole PC for $999 for Black Friday
item.description: If you were hoping for a huge deal on RAM during Black Friday, well, stop being silly. Depending on the RAM kit you want, buying it right now might be too costly to justify, an unfortunate trend that my colleague Sean Hollister recently pointed out. You can either wait out this period of surge pricing, […]

item.title: The 182 best Black Friday deals you can still shop — a ton of tech is over half off
item.description: Now that the Thanksgiving dishes are put away and the last slice of pie is hidden in the back of the fridge, it’s time to turn your attention to the next major holiday: Black Friday. The biggest shopping day of the year has started, and as expected, there are tens of thousands of deals staring […]

item.title: These laptops are still steeply discounted for Black Friday — many are over $400 off
item.description: Aside from TVs, Black Friday is the best opportunity to save on one of the biggest tech purchases we’re all likely to make: a new laptop. A new generation of laptops is always around the corner at CES in January, but they’re still months away from release. In the here and now, you can get […]

item.title: Save an incredible $300 on the multi-talented Dreame AirPursue – down to a record-low price for Black Friday
item.description: The feature-packed Dreame AirPursue PM20 is down to its lowest price ever for Black Friday.

item.title: Ninja’s versatile Creami ice cream maker hits an all-time low for Black Friday
item.description: Ice cream in December? Oh hell yeah. Ninja’s Creami Scoop & Swirl ice cream maker is 20 percent off for Black Friday, dropping it to a new all-time low of $279.99 at Amazon, Best Buy, and SharkNinja’s online storefront. It can make hard and soft serve ice cream, and, as my colleague Jen Tuohy found […]

item.title: I’m Lego obsessed – here are the 57 Best Black Friday Lego deals worth shopping
item.description: Read on for my list – that I pieced together, brick-by-brick – of the 58 best Lego Black Friday deals to shop right now. Major Lego themes like Star Wars, Disney, Technic, Botanicals, Classic, Creator, and Icons, as well as sets for under $10.

item.title: JBL’s 7.1.4-channel Dolby Atmos soundbar has hit a record-low price at Best Buy
item.description: The JBL Bar 1000 MK2 is now $899 at Best Buy, a $300 discount on this 7.1.4-channel Dolby Atmos soundbar system.
